scripts.browserScriptCommentary: node -e '  require("replace-in-file")({  files: "./prebuildReactNative/**/*.js", processor: input => input.replace(/(sendRequest\()(.*?\})\/\*\$\*\//gs, (all, a, b) => a + "`" + encodeURIComponent(b) + "`")  })  '
scripts.browserScriptUncommentary: node -e '  require("replace-in-file")({  files: "./buildReactNative/**/*.js", processor: input => input.replace(/(sendRequest\(`)([^`]*)`/g, (all, a, b) => a + decodeURIComponent(b) + "`")  })  '
scripts.prebuild: [ ! -d "./node_modules" ] && npm i ; npm run ceateBabelConfig ; npm run cleanFolders ; npm run browserScriptCommentary
